mapper.select: SELECT r.role FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON ur.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.name = #{name}

SELECT p.`name` FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON ur.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.name = #{name}
